item.title: Calculate softmax
item.description: Calculate softmax $\sigma(\vec{z})i = \frac{e^{z_i}}{\sum{j=1}^{K}e^{z_j}}$ from math import exp import numpy as np z = [13, 9, 9] np.round(np.exp(z)/sum(np.exp(z)),2) array([0.96, 0.02, 0.02])

item.title: Standard includes
item.description: Basic includes for TensorFlow import os import pathlib import matplotlib.pyplot as plt import numpy as np import seaborn as sns import tensorflow as tf from tensorflow.keras.layers.experimental import preprocessing from tensorflow.keras import layers from tensorflow.keras import models from IPython import display # Set seed for experiment reproducibility seed = 42 tf.random.set_seed(seed) np.random.seed(seed)
